title: Did Ben Carson's family benefit from social care?
subtitle: Mims asserts that Ben Carson benefited from social care early in life, simply because such programmes caused "the dissolution of the family unit" and "the American slave of African descent."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Dr. Ben Carson said, "The dissolution of the family unit and the welfare State, the enslavement of African Americans and the destruction of their future," but they received help from such programs in their youth.
